page.title: 13Interview with Canon Kelly.
page.content: Canon Kelly is our vicar. We asked him what will happen to preaching in the future. Mr Kelly thinks that there will be alot of lady vicars in the next 20,30 years.He says he doesn't think the style of clothes will change for preaching very much,but if he had a choice he would wear clothes that are more simple and colourful. He said some churches are already using pop music to sing to and he wouldn't mind if they used pop music in his church and he says he agrees with pets in church.The services might change a bit but they have only just changed in 1980.The services will just last the same length of time.He said he wouldn't like to see any new changes to the outside of the church but he would like a tapestry on the west wall inside the church.
